rtp: RTP (Return to Player) is the % of wagered money a game pays back over time. WagerX recommends slots with 96%+ RTP.
house edge: The casino's mathematical advantage. Lower is always better for the player. Look for 'Originals' for the best odds.
provably fair: A blockchain system allowing you to verify every bet's fairness using cryptographic seeds.
kyc: Know Your Customer. WagerX audits focus on 'No-KYC' sites that allow anonymous play via crypto.
wagering: The amount you must bet before withdrawing bonus funds. (e.g., 10x wagering on $100 = $1,000 total bets).
rekt: Crypto-slang for 'Wrecked'. It means suffering a massive loss. Stay safe and never bet more than you can lose!
degen: Short for 'Degenerate'. A high-risk player who loves volatility. WagerX is built to keep degens informed.
moon: When a coin or a multiplier hits a massive peak. 'To the moon!' refers to chasing those 1000x+ hits.
wagmi: 'We Are Gonna Make It'. An optimistic rally cry in the crypto community.
